group_1.textRight: Not here, either...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, the invoice for the drinks that the chairman was@worried about doesn't seem to be the source.

group_1.textRight: What else did everyone worry about...?

group_1.textLeft: Schoolwork and classes...family matters...
And perhaps romance...?

group_1.textRight: Most of that can be explained by their love@for you, Lady San.

group_1.textLeft: They were surely just joking around.

group_1.textRight: But I think some of them are being serious.
I mean, just the thought of your shapely legs, and...

group_1.textLeft: Miyu...

group_1.textRight: Pwease forgive Miyu...

group_1.textLeft: I prefer things the way they are now.@It's the most comfortable this way.
We can be united through the festival,@as the Youth Association is now.

group_1.textRight: Ah! What about the festival?!

group_1.textLeft: That was my first thought.
But the community center, which would have@been the biggest disaster, was safe.

group_1.textRight: That's true, too...
Lady San!

group_1.textLeft: I felt that as well. That magic response suggests@a rather powerful Witch...

group_1.textRight: Maybe that's where everyone in the@Youth Association was taken!

group_1.textLeft: It's quite possible! Let's make haste!
There were totally no responses in the areas@I checked...

group_1.textRight: Same as I wrote earlier. No Witches on my end.

group_1.textLeft: Me neither...

group_1.textRight: That goes for me, too...
That was magic just now! Did you sense that?!

group_1.textLeft: That Witch's magic felt seriously deadly...

group_1.textRight: [chara:305101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Mitsune updated!

group_1.textLeft: What'd Miwarin post?

group_1.narration: [textBlack:I'm on my way to the scene of the crime!]@[textBlack:Looks like it's a place I've kept my eye on.]@[textBlack:If any incident is prevented today,]@[textBlack:consider it thanks to me.]

[textBlack:I may not be able to give you any proof,]@[textBlack:because sometimes I fight what can't be seen,]@[textBlack:but I can show you the places I visit,]@[textBlack:so I hope you can judge me based on that.]
[textBlack:There's someone in Takarazaki who]@[textBlack:protects this town.]

group_1.textRight: Even if we solve a case involving a Witch...
We'll never have any proof that we did anything...
I guess that's the lesson Mitsune learned...

group_1.textLeft: But, this post will help us find her...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, Mitsune's gonna be shocked we remember.
The location of this photo is...
...the same place we released Alina's Witch...?!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
So new impurities were drawn to the site of@powerful impurities...
Considering the scale of the previous one,@Miwarin's on a total suicide mission.

group_1.textRight: Don't even joke about that.
Even if she knows she's no match for it...in her@current state, she'll still end up going in...!
She's probably posting this to psych herself up...!

group_1.textLeft: I know, I won't let her die.
Because, Kazarin and Miwarin, you're both@my friends.
